Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory866.jpg'}
{3: 'Here, time seems a divine grace stripped away.'}
{3: 'This place is dominated by guns, bacteria, steel, blood, fire, and death.'}
{3: 'Load, aim, shoot, and eject.'}
{3: 'The Lee-Enfield rifle in her hands, capable of firing ten rounds in half a minute, becomes a rhythm of survival.'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "I'm still not at my best! If my master were here, he could fire thirty rounds in a minute!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Aim for their heads, stop wasting bullets!'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "If you're so good, why don't you do it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: "Alright, let's enjoy the peace while it lasts, stop arguing.", 4: '1'}
{3: '<You are resting against a collapsed triangular wall.>'}

{3: '<Around you, an eclectic arsenal sprawls out: from muzzle-loading rifles and bolt-action rifles to submachine guns and sniper rifles. There are also magnetic pulse rifles, cannons powered by unknown energies, and an array of flashy, sophisticated firearms.>'}

{3: '<The array extends beyond guns to include hammers, katanas, scalpels, and heavy greatswords. There are wizard staves, chainsaws, and daggers, alongside those wielding bare fists or even conducting a military band.>'}
{3: "<It's a bizarre sight—what, have painters and bards now joined the fray as well?>"}
{3: '<In this madness, anything seems possible.>'}
{3: '<Just like the sword in your hand.>'}

{3: '<Despite your exhaustion, the sound of human voices nearby draws your attention. Ignoring the pain, you limp toward what appears to be a group of relatively normal-looking people, hoping to find some semblance of order or perhaps an ally.>'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier B', 3: "Wow! There's somebody still alive!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Come, have a seat here.', 4: '1'}
{3: '<The soldiers, curious as if viewing a rare animal, circle around you.>'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Why are you so clean?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Dressed all in white, did you just come from a funeral?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: 'Show some respect. We even got farmers with scythes out here too!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: "You're good at breaking up fights.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: 'Hey, where did you come from?', 4: '2'}
{3: "<You shake your head, because you really don't know how you ended up here.>"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'What is this battle—or this war?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Where did those monsters come from, and how long have you been here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'No idea, not a clue.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'All we know is that in two days, when reinforcements arrive, we break through.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: "That's nonsense. Didn't you hear that from Kaka?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: "And Kaka's been dead for three days!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier B', 3: "How do you know it's been three days?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: "I've been keeping track!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier B', 3: 'In this endless darkness, how can you tell one day from another?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "So, you're waiting for reinforcements?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Not here yet.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "So, you've just been here all this time?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: "What else can we do? There's nowhere to go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I've been here... about five days now.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'See, I told you so!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Time here is messed up.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Some bastard must be messing with time around here!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'If you ask me—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Alright, alright.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Hey, want some food? I just made it!', 4: '1'}
{3: '<She places a bowl of deep red soup in front of you.>'}
{3: '<The thick, bubbling soup contains chunks of unidentifiable meat and organs. It looks disgusting but smells surprisingly delicious.>'}
{3: "<Refusal is a virtue, something you're quite adept at, isn't it?>"}
{3: '<The soldier returns to the group, silently enjoying the meal.>'}
{3: '<The delightful aroma only makes you more exhausted. The endless battles have every part of your body screaming.>'}
{3: '<The trench is full of mud, and you slowly slump down to the ground.>'}
{3: '<Is there something beneath you?>'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4201_08.jpg'}
{3: "<It's just a severed hand.>"}
{3: '<In such wars, who doesn\'t die? Who doesn\'t lose a few "parts" of themselves?>'}
{3: '<Legs, eyes, ears, ribs, arms.>'}
{3: '<And of course, losing "life.">'}
{3: '<These tragedies happen thousands of times in war, repeating over and over again.>'}
{3: '<It never stops.>'}
{3: '<As long as humanity exists, they will continue, endlessly...>'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Dying in battle...'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But still holding this gun.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Keep fighting... until...'}
{3: '<Until death, right?>'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory866.jpg'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the crimson air seems ignited. A brilliant white light from the plains far away lights up the entire battlefield, a towering mushroom cloud squeezing the sky.'}
{3: 'A few seconds later, a deafening boom follows—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier B', 3: "Reinforcements! They've arrived!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'The reinforcements are supporting us!', 4: '1'}
{3: '<Look at how happy those who rush into war are.>'}
{3: '<Overjoyed, the soldiers rush toward the blinding explosion, ignoring the searing pain in their eyes.>'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'An explosion of this magnitude...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Retreat! Quickly! Or you'll die!!!", 4: '1'}
{3: '<But who are you to order them around?>'}
{3: '<You are just a mere number in this war.>'}
{3: '<An endless number.>'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/UiSpine/UiMovieSpine/UiMovieQu/UiMovieQu01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'A hot wind, laden with high-energy particles, sweeps across the battlefield.'}
{3: 'It peels off the skin, burns the fat, dismantles the muscles, tears apart the organs, and crushes the bones.'}
{3: 'Later, when I reach the sea of corpses and blood, the soldiers are nowhere to be seen.'}
{3: 'They might be part of that sea now, claimed by the war itself.'}
{3: "I know, it's part of war, a price that must be paid. I shouldn't be so sentimental."}
{3: 'Yet, something still urges my "heart."'}
{3: 'It makes my hands search the ground, filling my nails with blood and dirt.'}
{3: 'It compels me to search and dig, despite the futility.'}
{3: 'Time becomes indistinct.'}
{3: 'All that remains are bodies melded with metal.'}
{3: 'This is what war leaves in its wake.'}
{3: "I couldn't save anyone."}
{3: 'I could only watch as a wild blaze of fire and smoke licked the sky, the scorching wind searing my skin.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory866.jpg'}
{3: 'I stagger to my feet; the only other living thing is a vulture.'}
{3: 'Across the expanse, far in the distance, I see another figure struggling to rise amidst the flames.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'He is frail, his body bent over like an oversized newborn.'}
{3: "He isn't a survivor."}
{3: 'He is just like me.'}
{3: 'We both defied death.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory890.jpg'}
{3: 'But night now re-ascends, and it is time for parting. All is seen.'}
